APPEARANCE.name: Last of Mohicans Living of the Dead MacGuffin

description:
* Based on the popular manga by http://anidb.net/cr6124 [Sorachi Hideaki].
http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Sakata Gintoki] is a samurai living in an era when samurais are no longer needed. To add to his troubles, oppressive aliens have moved in to invade. Gintoki lives with http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] and http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shimura Shinpachi], taking on odd jobs to make the world a better place... and to pay their rent.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Long ago, this nation was known as the land of the samurai. The dream-filled Edo skies, upon which the samurai once gazed, are now filled with the ships of the Amanto, beings that suddenly invaded and rose to power. And now these arrogant aliens walk the streets of the city. The samurai have lost their swords, status, and even their honor In this city former samurai Gintoki Sakata runs the Odd Jobs business. One day he receives a visit from a client named Katoken. To regain something he has lost, Katoken needs 30 million ryoa lot of money. After listening to Katokens endless tale of misfortune, the Odd Jobs trio feels obliged to help out. Meanwhile, the Amanto Kariya and his men gather to plot the takeover of Edo city
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Habt ihr erstmal eine Silberseele, Ihr Bastarde!
Temeeraaaa!! Soredemo Gintama Tsuiten no kaaaa! (Zenpen)
You Jerks! And You Claim to Have Gintama?! (Part 1)

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki manage to escape Shishimuras sudden attack. Regrouping with Kagura and the others, he finds that their client Katoken was unable to stick with the training and has left. Gintoki finds Katoken drowning in his sorrows alone and joins him for a drink to share his wisdom: No matter how much you try, you cannot escape from what you truly wish to forget. Hearing those words, Katoken explains the reason behind his wanting to become stronger. Gintoki decides to lend a hand to help Katoken regain his most important treasure. Together with Kagura and Shinpachi, they march into the Drift Star Embassy only to find themselves welcomed by a mountain full of food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Habt ihr erstmal eine Silberseele, Ihr Bastarde! - Teil 2
Temeeraaaa!! Soredemo Gintama Tsuiten no kaaaa! (Kouhen)
You Jerks! And You Claim to Have Gintama?! (Part 2)

REGULAR.description:
The arrival of the Amanto has forced the samurai to throw away their swords. But Shinpachis father lived by the way of the sword, never losing his samurai honor. With his dying breath, the father entrusts his two children with the samurai spirit. To protect the dojo left behind by his father, Shinpachi works hard at jobs hes not used to doing. But to a boy who knows only swordsmanship, the world is not a kind place. When Shinpachi is ridiculed by his manager and laughed at by the Amanto, one man stands up to confront them. Shinpachi sees an honest samurai within the man as he pounds down the manager and wipes out the Amanto for ruining his chocolate parfait. Yes, this man is in fact Gintoki Sakata, also known as Odd Jobs Gin. The Last Samurai with naturally wavy hair for a trademark?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nobody with Naturally Wavy Hair Can Be That Bad
Tennen Perm ni Warui Yatsu wa Inai
Unter Naturlockentrgern gibt es keine bsen Menschen!

REGULAR.description:
Half a month has passed since Shinpachi began working for Odd Jobs Gin. Unable to see in Gintoki the glowing samurai spirit he felt, Shinpachi is already regretting his decision. One day as Gintoki and Shinpachi ride double on their scooter, a girl suddenly jumps in front of them. Unable to stop, Gintoki runs over the girl. Gintoki rushes the injured and unconscious girl toward the hospital, when suddenly a black car blocks the way and opens fire. While Gintoki and Shinpachi panic, the girl regains consciousness and blocks the bullets and wipes out the attackers with her built-in gun umbrella. Theres a reason the yakuza are after her, and Shinpachi decides to help the girl escape. However
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beachtet, dass das Shonen-Jump Magazin von Zeit zu Zeit auch Samstags erscheint!
Jump wa Tokidoki Doyou ni Deru Kara Ki o Tsukero
Watch Out! Weekly Shonen Jump Sometimes Comes Out on Saturdays!

REGULAR.description:
The staff of Odd Jobs Gin is going about their usual daily bickering when a delivery scooter crashes into the Otose Snack House downstairs. Barely conscious, the postman begs the Odd Jobs Trio to deliver an important package in his place. Gintoki and the others reluctantly head to the address on the package, Embassy of Inui, the Dog Star system. But the package explodes, and the trio are mistaken as terrorists. The three attempt a hasty escape, but when Shinpachi is caught, he decides to take Gintoki and Kagura down with him, and the gatekeepers quickly corner the three. Just when everybody thinks they are done for, they are saved by Gintokis old acquaintance Kotaro Katsura, aka Zura. Secretly observing the whole incident, the governments police force, the Shinsengumi, decides to make their move
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jijii ni Natte mo Ada Na de Yobiaeru Tomodachi o Tsukure
Make Friends You Can Call by Their Nicknames, Even When You`re an Old Fart
Schafft euch Freunde mit Spitznamen an!

REGULAR.description:
Although their actions result in saving everyone from Katsuras bomb, Gintoki and the group are nonetheless held for police questioning. Convinced Odd Jobs Gin are behind the bombing, the police continue their interrogation, when Shinpachi, who was staring at the clock the whole time, finally snaps. Baffled by his raging fit, the police finally let the trio go. Ignoring Gintoki and Kagura who vent their resentment in front of the police station, Shinpachi leaves the scene in a hurry. Left behind, Gintoki and Kagura come across an escaped convict being chased by the police. The man takes Kagura hostage and orders Gintoki to take the wheel in the police car. When asked by Gintoki why he ran away the man answers, Because today is a special day
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Einmal gegebene Versprechen hlt man bis zum Tod!
Ichido Shita Yakusoku wa Shinde mo Mamore
Keep a Promise Even If It Kills You

REGULAR.description:
Midland Star Prince Hatas pet Pes disappears, and the Immigration Bureau, though resentful of the Amantos orders, ask Odd Jobs Gin to look for the missing pet. Hearing that the client is an Amanto, the Odd Jobs at first turn down the offer but quickly change their minds when they are presented with a stack of cash. So begins Gintoki and groups hunt for the pet. Looking for any kind of lead, the group makes the rounds of the octopus fisherman at the piers, takoyaki stores, and bars, but Pes is nowhere to be found. With few options left, Gintoki brings out his ultimate weapon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Halter von Haustieren tragen auch die Verantwortung!
Pet wa Kainushi ga Sekinin o Motte Saigo Made Medou o Mimashou
Responsible Owners Should Clean Up After Their Pets

REGULAR.description:
While the Shinsengumi strive to maintain peace in the city of Edo, their commander Kondo is busy sulking in front of Otae, who now works at a snack bar. Depressed, Kondo calls himself a good-for-nothing. Otae gently smiles and tells him that she would love a man for his whole self, including his weaknesses. With those words, Kondo falls in love with Otae and asks her to marry him, but receives a knock-out punch instead. Undaunted, Kondo uses all sorts of means to show his affection for the immovable Otae. Finally having enough of it, Otae drags Gintoki into the situation, but things take an unexpected turn
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nebari Tsuyosa to Shitsukosa wa Kamihitoe
There Is but a Fine Line Between Persistence & Stubbornness
Zwischen Beharrlichkeit und Lstigkeit besteht ein haarfeiner Unterschied!

REGULAR.description:
From Hijikata to Okita, and Okita to the Shinsengumi, news quickly spreads of the commander losing in battle for a woman, stirring up commotion within the squad. To make matters worse, Kondos miserable loss is aired on TV, forcing Hijikata to figure out some way to gain back the Shinsengumis dignity. To do so, they must eliminate the silver-haired samurai who defeated Kondo. Hijikata joins the other members to search for Gintoki in town. Meanwhile, oblivious of single-handedly earning the Shinsengumis malice, Gintoki is yanked away to help with his clients carpeting job. While the whining Gintoki helps out the client, the Shinsengumi closes in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fighting Should Be Done with Fists
Kenka wa Guu de Yarubeshi
Streitigkeiten regelt man mit den Fusten!

REGULAR.description:
Prince Hata makes yet another visit to Edo. Heartbroken over the loss of Pes, the prince goes through every Edo city zoo determined to find the next cutest pet. Meanwhile, savoring her pickled seaweed, Kagura comes across a box left in front of the Odd Jobs Gin building. Her face lights up with a big smile when she finds an adorable animal in the box. The animal is a slightlyno, VERY big dog-like creature. Despite Gintokis protests, Kagura insists on keeping it. Kagura names the dog Sadaharu and plays rough with it, while Gintoki and Shinpachi grow exhausted from Sadaharus constant biting. What will Gintoki and Shinpachi do?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eat Something Sour When You`re Tired
Greift in Zeiten der Erschpfung zu Saurem!
Tsukareta Toki wa Suppai Mono o

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Kagura visit Shinpachi in the hospital after a car accident. Even in the hospital the Odd Jobs Trio is noisy as usual. An old man in the next room overhears their conversation and asks for their help. He requests that they look for a woman from the old mans bittersweet memories. The only lead they have is a kanzashi, and that the kanzashis owner worked at a Dango shop. The Odd Jobs Trio begin their search but find that nobody seems to remember the Dango shop, and they quickly reach a dead-end. Kagura tries having Sadaharu trace the scent from the kanzashi, and the place Sadaharu leads them to is not at all what they expected
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bechabecha Shita Dango Nante naa~ Dango ja nee~ Bakayaroo~
Look, Overly Sticky Sweet Dumplings Are Not Real Dumplings, You Idiot!
Wssriges Dango ist kein Dango, Bldmann!

REGULAR.description:
One night Otose, the landlord of Gintokis Odd Jobs, comes across a starving cat-eared Amanto named Catherine in the back alley and hires her to work at the Otose Snack House. Otose comes to take a liking to the hard-working and considerate Catherine. The Odd Jobs Trio on the other hand find themselves under a tighter budget and constant hunger thanks to Kaguras hearty appetite. Meanwhile, a string of robberies occur in the downtown district. One day, the police make a visit to the Otose Snack House to gather any information regarding the recent robberies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daiichi Inshou ga Ii Yatsu ni Roku na Yatsu wa Inai
Ein positiver erster Eindruck kann tuschen!
People Who Make Good First Impressions Usually Suck

REGULAR.description:
Odd Jobs Gin receives a job to look for a missing person, the daughter of a distinguished government official who hasnt returned home in days. Reluctantly accepting the clients wish to settle the case quietly, the Odd Jobs Trio goes to gather information at a club where the girl was often sighted. Unable to get any useful leads and tired of looking, Kagura tries to nab a man who looks similar to the girl, when the mans condition suddenly changes. According to a waiter, a weird drug is floating around this district. Meanwhile Gintoki is alone in the mens room recovering from a massive hangover when somebody calls to him over the door.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cosplay Suru Nara Kokoro Made Kazare
If You`re Going to Cosplay, Go All Out
Wenn schon Cosplay, dann mit Herz!

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Gintoki and Katsura, the space pirates ship is brought down. Several antiforeigner factions use this opportunity to take down high government officials who profited from their illegal drug collusion with pirates and Amantos. The Shinsengumi is ordered to provide protection for the officials. Kondo unquestioningly carries out his duty, claiming that if it werent for the government the Shinsengumi wouldnt be where it is today. But the members cannot hide their frustration toward the corrupt Amanto and government officials. Amidst all of this, Kondo is shot down by the antiforeigner faction, taking the hit intended for a frog Amanto they were assigned to protect. Just when the Shinsengumis frustration is about to explode, they hear Hijikata shouting
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otoko ni wa Kaeru ni Sawarete Ichininmae Mitai na Wake no Wakaranai Ruuru ga Aru / Waki Dake Arattokya Iindayo Waki Dake
Um als echter Mann zu gelten, musst du erst einen Frosch berhren!
You Only Gotta Wash Under Your Armpits / Just the Armpits

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki finds himself forced into looking after Sadaharu and is soon exhausted. Thats when Katsura shows up with a peculiar creature. Seems this thing is a gift from the space merchant Sakamoto and is called Elizabeth. Gintoki is surprised at the fact that Katsura, who supposedly hates space creatures, would keep such a pet. Then Gintoki and the gang learn that a TV show is looking for weird animals to appear on their show. Blinded by the grand prize given to the winner, Gintoki and the gang decide to participate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haustiere hneln ihren Haltern!
Kainushi to Pet wa Niru
Pets Resemble Their Owners

REGULAR.description:
Kagura sees Hasegawa wasting his time at the park in broad daylight and asks what hes doing. Since he was fired from the Immigration Bureau after punching Prince Hata on a passing whim, Hasegawa now walks down the path of a Dumb Old Retarded Kook, DORK for short. Ordered by his superior to commit seppuku, Hasegawa returns home to pack up and skip town only to find his wife has already left, saying she cant deal being with a DORKH (Dumb Old Retarded Kook Husband). Having lost everything, the only friend Hasegawa has now is Gintoki, whom he met at the pachinko parlor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Stop and Think About It, Your Life`s a Lot Longer as an Old Guy Than a Kid! Whoa, Scary!!
Kangaetara Jinseitte Ossan ni Natte kara no Hou ga Nagai ja Nee ka! Kowa!!
Umso lter man wird, umso lnger wird das Leben!

REGULAR.description:
The Kabukicho Neighborhood Association, led by Otose, marches toward the doorstep of Edos No. 1 inventor, Gengai Hiraga. The association has had it with Gengais noisy building of useless junk. Recruited by Otose, the Odd Jobs Trio fights sound with sound by blasting music from their karaoke machine but are stopped by the sudden appearance of the robot Saburo. The Odd Jobs Trio then proceed to relocate Gengais workshop to the nearby riverbank, only to end up breaking Saburo and the other robots created by Gengai, who were to perform for the shogun at the upcoming festival. Meanwhile a dangerous man has set foot into Edo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oyakotte no wa Iya na Toko Bakari Niru Mon da
Sons Only Take After Their Fathers` Negative Attributes
Vter und Shne hneln sich nur in ihren schlechten Eigenschaften

REGULAR.description:
Shinpachi returns home with a gift for his sistera doll that oddly resembles Elizabeth, with the name Space Monster Stefan printed on its chest. But what awaits Shinpachi is a deadly naginata swing by the raged Otae. While Shinpachi narrowly dodges the attack, Stefan falls prey to the naginata. As she tears Stefan apart, Otae explains the reason behind her fit. It appears the panty thief whos recently been stirring things up in Edo city stole her panties. To soothe her sisters anger, Shinpachi decides to ask for help from Gintoki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aa Yappari Wagaya ga Ichiban da wa
Hach, bei uns zuhause ist es immer noch am schnsten!
Oh, Yeah! Our Crib Is Number One!

REGULAR.description:
There are men who try to earn an easy buck by settling their hopes on pachinko, only to fail miserably. Regretting their decision, Gintoki and Hasegawa are sucking on their ice candies bought with the dropped change they collected, when they overhear something about a moneymaking opportunity. A reward has been placed on a space creature thats been haunting the beach. Gintoki and Hasegawa propose to fish out the alien and grab the reward, and the Odd Jobs gang head out to the beach. But what awaits them there is a deserted beach and an old man making yakisoba noodles at the beach house. And the reward in fact turns out to be
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umi no Mizu ga Naze Shoppai ka da to? Omeera Tokaijin ga Oyoginagara Youzoku Shitekukara Darou gaaa!!
Weshalb Meerwasser salzig ist? Weil ihr Grostdter stndig ins Meer pinkelt!
Why`s the Sea So Salty? Because You City Folk Pee Whenever You Go Swimming!

REGULAR.description:
One hot summer night, as mosquitoes fill the air, the Shinsengumi immerse themselves in sharing scary tales. Inayama tells the tale of a female ghost dressed in a red kimono haunting the schoolhouse at midnight, only to find that the same ghost has appeared in the Shinsengumi station as well! More than half of the team falls victim to the ghost, each muttering about a woman dressed in red. Frightened by the unseen danger, Kondo decides to hire an exorcist to handle the situation. But these exorcists seem awfully shady-looking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Belt Conveyer wa Ki o Tsukero
Nehmt euch in Acht vor Fliebndern!
Watch Out for Conveyor Belts!

REGULAR.description:
Amidst a summer heat wave with no air conditioning, the Odd Jobs office quickly turns into a steam house. When Gintoki and Kagura fight over and break the Senpuki (fan), their only means of dealing with the heat, Gintoki reluctantly heads out to buy a new one  only to run into extreme difficulties. Every store tells him they no longer sell an obsolete product like the fan and recommends buying an AC instead, which is beyond Gintokis budget. Finally, Gintoki comes across a recycled goods shop called the Earth Defense Army Base. Upon entering the store, he finds himself embroiled with the female store owners battle to protect the Senpuki (???)"?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bist du ein Mann, bestellst du Schwertfisch!
If You Go to Sleep with the Fan On, You`ll Get a Stomachache, So Be Careful
Otoko Nara Toriaezu Kajiki! / Senpuuki Tsukeppanashi de Nechau to Ohara Kowashichau Kara Ki o Tsukete

REGULAR.description:
One morning Shinpachi makes his usual commute to the Odd Jobs to wake up Gintoki when he comes across an unbelievable sight. Right inside Gintokis room, sleeping next to him is a woman dressed in a kunoichi outfit! As she mixes some natto, the woman named Sachan tells Gintoki that that the two made a vow the night before to become husband and wife, even though the hung-over Gintoki has no recollection of what happened. Thus, the Odd Jobs are forced to let Sachan stay at their place as an unwelcome wife. Just when everyone thinks Ginotkis unhappy days have begun, a single call for Sachan drastically changes matters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine Ehe ist gleichbedeutend mit einem Leben voller Irrtmer!
Kekkon to wa Kanchigai o Issho Shitsuzukeru Koto da
Marriage Is Prolonging an Illusion for Your Whole Life

REGULAR.description:
Returning with the groceries, Kagura puts on a sudden arrogant attitude that is understandably justified - She won a trip to space at the local big-sale raffle! Without a moment of hesitation the Odd Jobs trio head off to the Space Port. Unfortunately Sadaharu cannot join as they are told no pets are allowed on board. Insisting on bringing Sadaharu with her, Kagura starts arguing with the staff while Sadaharu goes off to harass a man with shades sleeping at the departure lobby. Curiously, the man disappears into the crowd without noticing the giant animal biting at his head. Carrying the Odd Jobs trio, the space ship sets off, but a group calling themselves the Moe Fighting Sprits shows up to hijack the ship
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Komatta Toki wa Warattoke Warattoke
Lacht in sorgenvollen Zeiten, lacht!
When You`re in a Fix, Keep On Laughing, Laughing...

REGULAR.description:
Mademoiselle Saigo: one of the Four Royals of Kabukicho and a girly man known as the demon. After calling this person a freak, Gintoki ends up being forced to cross-dress and work at the Girly Boy Club run by him (her?). At the club Gintoki comes across Katsura, who is also dressed as a woman. Katsura protests that he is merely waiting for the right moment to escape, but no matter how Gintoki looks at it, Katsura seems to have completely blended in with a life surrounded by girly men. One day the two encounter Saigos son Teruhiko, who is being bullied. Seeing that the boy is troubled, Katsura tries to console him, but?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cute Faces Are Always Hiding Something
Hbsche Gesichter haben definitiv etwas zu verbergen!
Kawaii Kao ni wa Kanarazu Nanika ga Kakureteru

REGULAR.description:
Gintama is celebrating its half-year run on the air! And so the Odd Jobs trio attempts to kill some time by airing some re-caps. But their true intentions are to draw away the others attention and eat as much meat as possible from the sukiyaki meal before them. Trying to read each others next moves, Gintoki and Shinpachi successfully trick Kagura and chow down, only to spill the pot all over the place. Realizing shes been tricked, Kagura begins arguing with Gintoki. Amidst this gloomy atmosphere Shinpachi believes that in order to avoid another messy tragedy, it is imperative to secure the meats safety first. And at that moment another pot challenger arrives with the battle for meat taking yet another turn for the chaotic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shared Soup Pot Is a Microcosm of Life
Im Nabe spiegelt sich das ganze Leben!
Nabe wa Jinsei no Shukuzu de Aru

REGULAR.description:
On Hasegawas request the Odd Jobs trio take his place to work at the Oedo Mart Convenience store for the day, but Kagura and Gintokis half-baked attitudes cause nothing but trouble for the customers. The only one whos working seriously, Shinpachi cannot help but sigh at his friends incompetence when he notice a punk trying to shoplift some goods. When Shinpachi catches the thief, he realizes it is Takachin, his childhood friend back from temple school. Ever since the day Shinpachi betrayed his trust, Takachin became a target for bullying. But now Takachin claims to be feared since joining a team called the Bulldogs. To save his friend from walking down the wrong path, Shinpachi breaks into the Maltese gathering.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Be Shy: Just Raise Your Hand and Say It
Es sollte euch nicht peinlich sein, euch zu Wort zu melden
Hazukashigarazu ni Te o Agete Ie

REGULAR.description:
At the Womens Wrestling Arena Shinpachi roots for Otsu the fighting idol, Kagura gets all excited and storms into the ring, and Gintoki watches his friends in shame. Okita also happens to be there, and leads the trio down to the slums where they discover an underground coliseum called the Rengokukan. Investigating the high authorities support for these death matches, Okita points out Kidomaru, Rengokukans deadliest fighter in a demon mask, suggesting the Odd Jobs may find out something from following him. The gang scouts Kidomarus house, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Es gibt Dinge, die ein Schwert nicht zu schneiden vermag!
Katana ja Kirenai Mono ga Aru
Some Things Can`t Be Cut with a Sword

REGULAR.description:
On the morning astrology program Ms. Ketsuno declares with a smile that Virgos with goatees who are brushing their teeth right now will die today... Kondo, who was watching the show while brushing his teeth, cant help but let out a wry sigh when Matsudaira thunders in, blasting away with his gun  the Shinsengumis involvement with the Rengokukan has come to light, and both are summoned to the castle. Baffled by Hijikata and Okitas impulsive actions, Kondo enters a state of panic after learning he may be assassinated before arriving at the castle. Matsudaira, who now sees everything as possible assassins, summons Sachan as a counter measure to assassins. Hence the dangerous drive to the castle begins...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Things Never Come in Twos (But Bad Things Do)
Gute Ereignissen folgen niemals aufeinander, schlechte Ereignisse schon!
Ii Koto wa Renzoku Shiteokoranai Kuse ni Warui Koto wa Renzoku Shiteokorumon da

REGULAR.description:
Part 1: Star Destroyer, the enchanted sword that can even cut through stars  searching for this legendary weapon, one man goes on a sword hunt night after night. The mans name is Gankeimaru, an Amanto training to become the strongest warrior, and he has come to Earth in search of the ultimate weapon worthy of his strength. Meanwhile Gintoki and Shinpachi learn that Kagura has been buying massive amounts of products from the shopping channel, and tells her to return them all. Upset from having all her items confiscated, Kagura comes up with an idea after spotting Gintokis wooden sword. Its just the start of another messy situation...  /   Part 2: Kaguras scream stirs up the Odd Jobs office. The cause? A cockroach! Thinking its an average cockroach, Gintoki and Shinpachi head out to kill it, only to retreat back on all fours. Why? Because it turns out to be a giant-sized cockroach! Around the same time, the TV reports multiple infestations of giant cockroaches throughout Edo city, and Prince Hata advises NOT to kill these Space Cockroaches, as it will attract more of them. Oblivious to such warnings, the Odd Jobs gang are about to exterminate the giant creature when it starts to scream...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awateruna! Cooling-off to Iu Mono ga Aru / Television to ka Shinbun to ka Chanto Minai to Dame Datte
Don`t Panic: There`s a Return Policy! / I Told You to Pay Attention to the News!
Ganz ruhig, es gibt schlielich das Rckgaberecht!

REGULAR.description:
Newcomer Idol Tsu Terakado and Boy Band Hansamu leader Goemons passionate affair revealed!  The news plunges Shinpachi and the fan club members into the depths of depression. Gintoki is also stunned after learning that his favorite weather reporter Ms. Ketsuno is married. But while Kagura smirks at the two losers, Otsu shows up at the Odd jobs office.  Since the discovery of the relationship, Otsu has received numerous threatening letters and has come for Gintokis help, but she has no clue as to who the culprit is. Shinpachi is determined to protect Otsu with all his might by staying close to her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aidoru Datte Hobo Omaera to Onaji Koto Yattenda yo
Even Teen Idols Act Like You Guys
Pop-Idole tun das Gleiche wie ihr!

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki finds himself lying on the ground, witnessing the blue sky gradually changing into red. Losing consciousness at the spot, Gintoki is rushed to the hospital. Turns out while on his way to buy Jump magazine on his bike, Gintoki was hit by a car driver who was talking on his cell phone. Shipnachi and the others rush to the hospital to see the now-conscious Gintoki, but learn he has no recollection of his own self In order to somehow return the now honest and likable Gintoki back to his dullish personality, Shinpachi and Kagura take him back to the Odd Jobs office. But despite their efforts there are no signs of his memory returning. To find other possible events that may trigger his memory, the Odd Jobs wander through the streets of Edo but
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doudemo Ii Koto ni Kagitte Nakanaka Wasurenai
Unwichtige Dinge vergisst man einfach nicht!
You Always Remember the Things That Matter the Least

REGULAR.description:
Two weeks have passed since Gintoki declared the disbanding of the Odd Jobs business and disappeared into the streets of Edo. Kagura sit and eats her pickled seaweed alone inside the ruined Odd Jobs office, which was destroyed by a spaceship. When Shinpachi comes to pick her up, Kagura tells him that she will not give up until Gintoki returns with his memories. Meanwhile Shinsengumi intelligence agent Yamazaki has infiltrated the Mamushi Factory where he finds some unexpected faces  The amnesic Gintoki and Kondo! Working diligently with a lively look on his face, Gintoki is now the building specialist for the Jastaway. But after the Jastaway explodes, Gintoki gets mixed up in another mess
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Leben fliet wie ein Flieband!
Jinsei wa Belt Conveyer no You ni Nagareru
Life Moves On Like a Conveyor Belt

REGULAR.description:
Having recovered from his amnesia, Gintoki attempts to renegotiate his overdue rent with Otose in celebration of his life starting anew. Instead, Otose cold-heartedly declares that unless the destroyed Odd Jobs office is repaired within a week, she will kick him out. Having no other choice, the trio try their hands on doing some unaccustomed carpenter work, but the task proves to be too difficult for the three amateurs. Irritated, Kagura and Gintoki lose control and create further destruction, when they receive a package sent by Sakamoto. Inside they find a letter, along with two little men. The two claims to be portable carpenters and begin rebuilding the Odd Jobs office
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Verwechseln von Namen ist unhflich!
Hito no Namae to ka Machigaeru no Shitsurei da
Mistaking Someone`s Name Is Rude!

REGULAR.description:
Members of the Otsu fan club are having a heated debate on the train about Otsus popularity being jeopardized by the appearance of TAMA, the cat-eared idol. After learning that fan club members are cheating with TAMA, Shinpachi delivers an iron-fisted punishment, which accidentally saves a girl who was being harassed by a drunken Matsudaira  and the girl turns out to be cat-eared! Shinpachi instantly falls for her cute looks, but panics after being asked out on a date by the girl, who is named Eromesu. Shinpachi tries to deal with the situation by asking for help on a web message board, but this only leads to further problems as the day arrives for his fateful date

Matsudaira summons Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita to the Ikedaya and informs the three of them that You-know-who is finally making his move. As tension runs high in the room, Matsudaira further declares its time for a showdown. Kondo and the others pledge their assistance to Matsudaira without really knowing whom this You-know-who is. When they find themselves at the amusement park and see a flirtatious man named Shichibei meet Kuriko, Matsudairas daughter, they realize Matsudaira is plotting to assassinate the man toying with his beloved daughter. Appalled by all of this, Hijikata decides to leave, but Kondo and Okita join in on the gig. And so begins the dramatic yet sad battle of men on a stake-out, ready to break up a couples date.

Finishing up their night job, Otae and Oryo walk home under the morning sunlight. While casually badmouthing their customers the two witness Hanako, the new kid at their bar, attempting to throw herself off a bridge. Otae quickly stops her and brings her home, where she learns the deeply troubled Hanako left her hometown of Osaka in order to become a dancer. Hanako then explains how she spent all her savings after joining the Dream Faith  a weird religious cult that promises to grant the power to make dreams come true. The Odd Jobs go undercover with Hanakos help, but
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Leute mit Dreck am Stecken reden mehr als andere!

On his way back from buying Nikuman one snowy night, Gintoki comes across an old man dressed in red and a reindeer arguing. Gintoki offers his help after hearing Santa complain of being unable to finish his job after his sled was destroyed. When Gintoki brings a two-wheeled cart instead, Santa whine over how it needs to be a sled to preserve his reputation. But after being talked down by Gintoki, Santa ends up making his deliveries dressed in all black. And so begin the burglar-like Santa and Reindeer, AND Gintokis night of delivering dreams to the kids.

Heavy snow falls upon the city of Edo. Otoses voice rings through the winter wonderland, signaling the start of the Kabukicho Snow Festival! The highlight of the festivities is a snow figure-building contest with grand prize money. Entering the contest for the money, the Odd Jobs trio builds a snow figure claiming to be the Neo Armstrong Cyclone Jet Armstrong Cannon. Despite Shinpachis protests, everyone who visits the sculpture compliments its perfection. But Gintoki and Kagura, concerned over the other contestants works, begin sabotaging other snow figures.

REGULAR.description:
While trying to force his way out of a Shinsengumi inspection, Katsura is hit by Okita`s bazooka and injures his leg. He tries to escape by running across roofs, but he is mistaken for an underwear thief and is defeated by Ikumatsu, the owner of the ramen shop, Daigo Ramen. The next morning, Ikumatsu serves him ramen to apologize for the misunderstanding. While Katsura eats, Ikumatsu`s brother-in-law noisily enters the shop with his henchmen. The atmosphere turns volatile, and sensing Ikumatsu`s uneasiness, Katsura chases out the unwanted guests. Katsura learns from Ikumatsu and her brother-in-law`s conversation that Ikumatsu is a widow and that the Joi Faction is responsible for her husband`s death. Thus an emotionally scarred man and woman begin a strange life together

While Edo is abuzz with talk of the movie Alien vs. Yakuza, a real alien has snuck into Edo from outer space. Kondo gets a tip from renowned alien buster Umibozu and has the Shinsengumi set up a cordon. Meanwhile, Kagura has fallen for an it`s me scam, which is causing a sensation in Edo. Kagura obediently follows instructions given by a man claiming to be Gintoki and rushes off to the bank. Unfortunately, the alien also happens to be at the same bank. Worried about Kagura, Gintoki and Shinpachi also arrive at the bank. But Kagura, who is being swallowed by the alien, catches the two and tries to bring them down together. At that very moment, Umibozu appears before the bunch. Kagura is stunned to see him
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Give a Thought to Planned Pregnancy
Kinder zeugen sollte wohl berlegt sein!

Fired by Gintoki, a depressed Kagura sits in the boarding area at the terminal with her father Umibozu. When he hears that Gintoki fired Kagura, Shinpachi lashes out and tells Gintoki to think of how much the Odd Jobs and Gintoki meant to Kagura. With that, Shinpachi announce to quit the Odd Jobs as well. Meanwhile, Kaguras spaceship is about to take off. In the cargo hold, Prince Hatas servant, Jii, has ordered that the princes cargo be organized, but the maintenance crew is terrified of the creepy cargo. Jii ends up breaking a vial, which is the beginning of an incident that will toss Edo into chaos
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Titel allein sagt noch lange nicht, ob ein Film spannend ist!

The alien continues to wreak havoc at the terminal when Gintoki appears on the scene with Sadaharu, only to be engulfed by the alien`s tentacles. Meanwhile, Umibozu finds Kagura fallen and injured after her attempt to save Prince Hata and Jii. Enraged, Umibozu seizes the two when Kagura stops and tells how proud she was of using her powers to save someone. The alien attempts to capture Kagura with its tentacles. Just as the alien is about to swallow her, Gintoki and Sadaharu come charging out of the alien`s mouth. Gintoki and Umibozu insult each other as they join forces to fight the alien. Meanwhile, in the sky, a Shogunate Battleship led by Matsudaira has appeared!

Umibozu leaves but Kagura decides to stay in Edo. Seeing her friends sitting pensively in the Otose Snack house, Kagura, feeling mischievous, spies on the bar from the outside. But soon her friends forget about their loneliness and move on to different topics: Gintoki`s crotch, beautiful women doctors, and the personalities of the female characters on the show Soon talk centers on who will be the new heroine to fill in the Odd Jobs roster. An evil magistrate named Chintaro Toyama captures Elizabeth. When Katsura bribes the Odd Jobs with food to save her, our heroes naturally accept. Recruiting the help of Sachan (after getting her fired from her job at a kunoichi caf), the rescue team, a.k.a. Go-Ninja Spy Force, sneaks into the magistrate`s office. But the Shinobi Five, led by Zenzo Hattori, stands in their way. Zenzo is still bitter about his scuffle with Gintoki over a Jump comic on New Year`s Eve, while Sachan faces Kaoru, her rival from ninja school. Shinpachi, Kagura, and Katsura defeat their opponents with curry laced with a laxative, but things get dangerous when Kagura carelessly takes a bite of the curry And then things get even crazier as Gintoki and Zenzo get into a heated debate about the Pegasus Meteor Slash pose, and Kaoru`s poison rose perfume attack goes off

One night, Gintoki comes back home after a long night of carousing, and sees that Sadaharu has become enormous. Gintoki and his crew are at a loss as to what caused this sudden growth, and the dog translation device that Gintoki got at the bar isn`t of any use. To make things worse for the bewildered threesome, Sadaharu gets even bigger, and when Sadaharu is shown on TV, Edo is thrown into an uproar. Curious bystanders barge into the Odd Jobs office, throwing rocks and injuring Kagura. Upon seeing this, Sadaharu
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aiken no Sanpo wa Tekido na Speed de
Geht mit angemessener Geschwindigkeit Gassi!
Walk Your Dog at an Appropriate Speed

REGULAR.description:
In order to pay off the damages for Sadaharu`s rampage, Ane not only has to let go of her savings but her shrine as well, and goes to work at Cabaret Smile. She is able to have her way with men and becomes the shop`s drawing card. But she doesn`t get along with Smile`s other featured employee, Otae. The two clashes with each other, and when Otae beats up Ane`s main customer, the owner of Kikuya, Smile`s manager lays down a resolution. He`s going to fire the person who has the least total sales the following day. A ruthless battle between women is about to begin! But that night, Otae tells Ane that she`s not going to compete. However, this might be Otae`s first attack--!

Gintoki and the gang are suffering from the mother of all hay fevers. One theory suggests the cause is a plant from a far-off planet, but no facts are available, and when Otose is forced to close her shop due to hay fever, it becomes apparent this is a serious situation.  One day a new resident named Hedoro moves in to Kabukicho, and the Odd Jobs crew learn that the menacing-looking Amanto runs a flower shop right next to their office. When it turns out that all the pollens are originating from the shop, the Odd Jobs suspect Hedoro is trying to weaken the population with hay fever and take over the world. Source: crunchyroll

The Shinsengumi capture one of the three Parco Brothers allies and the brothers go after Hijikata in retaliation. The youngest brother waits for Hijikata`s day off and sit next to Hijikata in a restaurant, preparing to strike, but the sight of the Hijikata Special, a bowl of rice topped with mayonnaise, and the Uji Gintoki-Don, a bowl of rice topped with a large helping of azuki beans, leads to an argument between Hijikata and Gintoki, and an unexpected knockout of the youngest Parco brother. Gintoki and Hasegawa visit a casino in an attempt earn some easy cash but before long theyve lost everything and are stripped down to their loincloths. The two complain that they can`t win because evil spirits possesses them. But when a renowned gambler named Kanbe, the Luck Reader, arrives on the scene and helps them get their clothes back, Gintoki and Hasegawa take a hint from his suaveness, and try their hands at blackjack, only to wind up getting their clothes taken away again. Either way its the second season, as the Odd Jobs crew reflect on securing a one-year slot on air and reminisce about the many events that occurred in the past year. As expectations of high ratings have given way to many hardships, Gintoki suggests that something needs to be done as the series continues on...

A baby is left on the doorstep of the Odd Jobs office with a message that says, It`s your baby. The baby has naturally curly silver hair and dead-fish eyes in other words, the baby looks exactly like Gintoki, and everyone besides him believes without a doubt that the baby is his love child. Shinpachi, Kagura, and Otose all become smitten by the baby named Kanshichiro. Panicked over the idea of Kanshichiro really beng his child, Gintoki flees the Odd Jobs office with the baby. But with no one willing to listen to his side of the story, Gintoki is at a loss. Meanwhile, Kahei Hashida, the owner of a large financial combine, visits the Odd Jobs. Kahei wants the Odd jobs to find Ofusa, the woman who kidnapped his grandson Kanshichiro. But Otose senses something fishy
Source: crunchyroll

Kahei is questioning the captured Ofusa about the whereabouts of baby Kanshichiro. When Shinpachi and Kagura, who are being chased by Nizo, come rushing in. Meanwhile, Gintoki visits the Hashida residence with Kanshichiro, but he is unable to talk to the Kihei, the company president, because he doesn`t have an appointment. Kabuki-cho has been plagued with a series of arsons. Source: crunchyroll

A mother suddenly barges into the Odd Jobs office, wanting them to find her son Hachiro, who disappeared after coming to Edo. Though perplexed by the mothers excessive concern, Gintoki and the gang begin their search for Hachiro. Using a photograph as a clue, they discover that Hachiro has undergone many plastic surgeries. They draw hair and a mustache on the photo for fun and a man named Hachiro who looks exactly like the man in the photo passes them by. Source: crunchyroll

So ziemlich jede Mutter ist gleich

Katsuo knocks Hachiro out and makes unreasonable demands of Kyoshiro, which Gintoki and the others oppose by acting as hosts. Edo is in an uproar about the serial kidnappings of women. The Shinsengumi goes overboard in cracking down and sees a sudden drop in their public image. Kondo invites pop idol Tsu Terakado to be chief for the day in order to call on Edo residents to prevent crimes, as well as to boost the Shinsengumi`s image. Otsu is eager to do her duty and begins reforming the Shinsengumi, beginning with the bureau`s regulations. The Odd Jobs Trio are asked by Otsu to accompany her dressed up as the uninspiring mascot character Makoto-chan. The Shinsengumi realizes who they are and a fight breaks out. Mutsu`s Pleasure Support Club tries to deliver batteries so powerful that one can power a space battleship to Aoki and Co. But a group of men dressed in black shows up and steals the batteries and the money. Mutsu asks the Odd Jobs to recover the batteries and the money and capture the Pleasure Support Clubs missing leader, Sakamoto. Gintoki and the others easily capture Sakamoto and go to Aoki and Co., but find no clues. Gintoki and the others are forced to go along with Sakamoto`s plan to go out gallivanting and drinking. As they totter down the night road, heading home, a group sneaks up behind them. Gintoki and Sakamoto realize the danger they`re in and reminisce about the past as they confront their attackers. Elizabeth comes to Yorozuya, but Katsura, who is always with her, isn`t there. Gintoki and the others are unsure how to treat Elizabeth. She doesn`t talk and is difficult to figure out. Shinpachi decides to serve her tea, but Elizabeth doesn`t react. He tries to serve her coffee next, but her attitude doesn`t change at all. Kagura decides to serve her a certain drink as a last resort. Upon being served that drink, Elizabeth quietly begins to shed tears!

Kagura has snuck onto a suspicious ship where she fights Takasugi under the bright moonlight. Kagura senses an odd presence and is attacked from behind. She escapes Matako Kijimas double pistols, but Henpeita Takechi is waiting for her with the ronin he leads. Kagura wreaks havoc, but in the confusion of battle, Matako hits her with a gunshot. Even though her shoulder and leg have been injured, Kagura fights on. Finally, she gets within the ship.

The Katsuras Faction launches a midair battle against Takasugi to avenge Katsura, who was attacked by Nizo the Butcher. Nizo fights back with Benizakura, a sword-shaped weapon that has become fused with his arm. Meanwhile, Henpeita Takechi and Matako Kijima have captured Kagura. Shinpachi sneaks on board Takasugi`s ship and uses the confusion of a cannon shot to successfully save Kagura.  Meanwhile, Gintoki is headed to Takasugis ship along with Tetsuko, the younger sister of Tetsuya, the creator of the Benizakura.

titles.title: Die Sonne geht immer wieder auf!
Hi wa Mata Noboru
The Sun Will Rise

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Nizo battle to the death on the deck of Takasugi`s ship. The anti-battleship weapon Benizakura has infiltrated Nizo`s mind, driving Nizo out of control. Gintoki fights back with a sword forged by Tetsuko. Nizo attacks with overwhelming strength, but slowly, the battle begins to turn in Gintoki`s favor. Meanwhile, within the ship, Takasugi plans to use the Benizakura to overthrow the shogunate, but he is confronted by Tetsuya, the man who forged the Benizakura, Tetsuya`s younger sister Tetsuko, and Katsura.

Nachtinsekten sammeln sich im Licht!

Hijikata receives a report from Shinsengumi inspector Yamazaki about the struggle between the Katsura Faction and Takasugi Faction. Included is information on sightings of people who appear to be the Jacks-of-all-trades in the riot. Hijikata suspects that Gintoki has connections with the Antiforeigner Faction, so he orders Yamazaki to investigate Gintoki`s affairs. Yamazaki questions Gintoki`s friends, but he isn`t able to get anything out of them. At his wit`s end, Yamazaki ends up visiting the Jacks-of-all-trades. The Jacks-of-all-trades are out, but he gets information that Gintoki is receiving medical treatment at Shinpachi`s house.

Ninja Zenzo Hattori runs through the city at night. His job requires him to be on time and fulfill his clients` requests perfectly. The job: pizza delivery. One night, as Zenzo is about to land, Gintoki crashes his scooter into Zenzo`s backside. Ignoring the pain of his hemorrhoids, Zenzo grabs the pizza box to make his delivery. But instead of the pizza box, Zenzo accidentally grabs Gintoki`s Jump. Zenzo`s client, Okuni, takes the Jump and tells Zenzo that misfortune will befall his rear and that he should be careful.

Katsura, who is secretly a member of the Joi Faction, is visited by a reporter from the talk show The Edo. Katsura tells reporter Hanano that he wants the citizens to know about the work that the Joi Faction has done and think about what they can do for the country. Led by Okita, the Shinsengumi barges in, and Katsura is forced to run. He takes out a corn potage-flavored Nmaibo from his kimono and shows it to the Shinsengumi, explaining that he carries it around as emergency rations. The Shinsengumi continue to pursue him, and Katsura throws the Nmaibo onto the roof. The Nmaibo acts as a smoke screen, and Katsura and his group manage to escape.

Nmaibou wa Igai to Onaka Ippai ni Naru

Stag beetle wrestling has become popular in Edo. Kagura enters Sadaharu 28, a dung beetle that she is fond of, into a competition. But Okita of the Shinsengumi barges in and defeats Kagura with his jumbo stag beetle. Meanwhile, Gintoki learns that stag beetles can be sold at high prices and plans to go to the forest to catch some. Kagura says that she wants to catch a stag beetle to avenge Sadaharu 28. The group heads to the forest, but they find the Shinsengumi already there, desperately looking for stag beetles

Gintoki is stuffing himself with dango at Konpeito, a quiet dango shop. The shop`s customers have been lured away by the sweets shop Andromeda, which is across the street. The owner persists in promoting his shop with his enthusiasm for dango. Gintoki learns that Sweets, the owner of Andromeda, is trying to drive Konpeito out of business because he wants the land. Konpeito`s owner wont agree to Sweets proposition, so Sweets challenges him to a competition. Konpeito and Andromeda will invite people to eat dango, and the shop whose dango is most popular wins. The loser has to close up shop. Konpeito`s owner is hesitant, but Gintoki has a plan. The match begins!

Lieber satt durch Dango, als sich an Blumen laben!
Substance over Form

Gintoki gets robot puppeteer Gengai Hiraga to fix his bike. But when Gintoki tries to leave Gengai`s shop without paying the repair bill, Gengai activates the modification he had secretly made. Gintoki loses control of his scooter and crashes it into another scooter belonging to Amanto express messenger Noriko Mach. Now Noriko is injured and unable to ride her bike. But it turns out she has a special physical condition.
